description: This Dart source file defines a custom theme class for a Flutter application. It provides a centralized `AppTheme` class with methods to generate ThemeData for the app, including color schemes, component styles (AppBar, Card, FAB, etc.), and a gradient background decoration. The theme emphasizes a modern, minimalist aesthetic with blue and amber accents, rounded corners, and smooth transitions.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods to generate consistent application themes and decorations for a Flutter app, emphasizing a modern minimalist design with blue and amber accents.

methods.name: oceanProfessional
methods.description: Generates a ThemeData object configured with a specific color scheme, typography, and component styles to match the Ocean Professional theme aesthetic.

methods.name: _textTheme
methods.description: Customizes the base TextTheme with specific styles for body and title texts, ensuring consistent typography throughout the app.

methods.name: gradientBackground
methods.description: Provides a BoxDecoration object with a linear gradient background matching the theme's primary color palette.
